EmailTemplate.name: RW_Contract_Expiring_Note
EmailTemplate.subject: A contract ({!Redwood_Contract__c.Name}) is near it's termination date
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The contract {!Redwood_Contract__c.Name} will expire in {!Redwood_Contract__c.DaysRemaining__c} days on {!Redwood_Contract__c.Termination_Date__c}.
Click below to view the record - {!Redwood_Contract__c.Link}
